document_data.mainbody: Gorin was an inhabitant of the Fortress of the Old Man, and one of the Blades of the Old Man. He was, along with Valmir, one of the few survivors of the night of Tarsakh 25 who met up with Talieth, Lewan and Ulaan after the three of them emerged from the Tower of the Sun. Though he was aware that Sauk was still inside, he preferred not to go check up on him.
